 23/// Binary expression block type.
 24///
 25/// Template parameters:
 26///   :Operation: Binary operation. Parametrized on value-type
 27///    for elementwise operation, or on block otherwise.
 28///   :LBlock: The first argument block.
 29///   :RBlock: The second argument block.
 30///   :Elementwise: True if this is an elementwise operation.
 31template <template <typename, typename> class Operation,
 32	  typename LBlock,
 33	  typename RBlock,
 34	  bool Elementwise = false>
 35class Binary;
 36
 37/// Binary expression block specialization for elementwise operations.
 38template <template <typename, typename> class Operation,
 39	  typename LBlock, typename RBlock>
 40class Binary<Operation, LBlock, RBlock, true> : impl::Non_assignable
 41{
 42  typedef Operation<typename LBlock::value_type, typename RBlock::value_type>
 43  operation_type;
 44public:
 45  static dimension_type const dim = LBlock::dim;
 46  typedef typename operation_type::result_type value_type;
 47  typedef value_type &reference_type;
 48  typedef value_type const &const_reference_type;
 49  typedef typename LBlock::map_type map_type;
 50
 51  Binary(LBlock const &lhs, RBlock const &rhs)
 52    : lhs_(lhs), rhs_(rhs) 
 53  {
 54//     assert(!Is_sized_block<LBlock>::value ||
 55// 	   !Is_sized_block<RBlock>::value ||
 56// 	   extent<dim>(lhs_) == extent<dim>(rhs_));
 57  }
 58  Binary(operation_type const &op, LBlock const &lhs, RBlock const &rhs)
 59    : operation_(op), lhs_(lhs), rhs_(rhs) 
 60  {
 61//     assert(!Is_sized_block<LBlock>::value ||
 62// 	   !Is_sized_block<RBlock>::value ||
 63// 	   extent<dim>(lhs_) == extent<dim>(rhs_));
 64  }
 65
 66  length_type size() const VSIP_NOTHROW
 67  {
 68    if (!impl::Is_sized_block<LBlock>::value) return rhs_.size();
 69    else if (!impl::Is_sized_block<RBlock>::value) return lhs_.size();
 70    else return lhs_.size(); 
 71  }
 72  length_type size(dimension_type Dim, dimension_type d) const VSIP_NOTHROW
 73  {
 74    if (!impl::Is_sized_block<LBlock>::value) return rhs_.size(Dim, d); 
 75    else if (!impl::Is_sized_block<RBlock>::value) return lhs_.size(Dim, d); 
 76    else return lhs_.size(Dim, d); 
 77  }
 78
 79  void increment_count() const VSIP_NOTHROW {}
 80  void decrement_count() const VSIP_NOTHROW {}
 81  map_type const &map() const VSIP_NOTHROW { return lhs_.map();}
 82
 83  operation_type const &operation() const VSIP_NOTHROW { return operation_;}
 84  LBlock const &arg1() const VSIP_NOTHROW {return lhs_;}
 85  RBlock const &arg2() const VSIP_NOTHROW {return rhs_;}
 86
 87  value_type get(index_type i) const
 88  {
 89    return operation()(this->arg1().get(i),
 90		       this->arg2().get(i));
 91  }
 92  value_type get(index_type i, index_type j) const
 93  {
 94    return operation()(this->arg1().get(i, j),
 95		       this->arg2().get(i, j));
 96  }
 97  value_type get(index_type i, index_type j, index_type k) const
 98  {
 99    return operation()(this->arg1().get(i, j, k),
100		       this->arg2().get(i, j, k));
101  }
102
103private:
104  operation_type operation_;
105  typename impl::View_block_storage<LBlock>::expr_type lhs_;
106  typename impl::View_block_storage<RBlock>::expr_type rhs_;
107};
108
109/// Binary expression block specialization for non-elementwise operations.
110template <template <typename, typename> class Operation,
111	  typename LBlock, typename RBlock>
112class Binary<Operation, LBlock, RBlock, false> : impl::Non_assignable
113{
114  typedef Operation<LBlock, RBlock> operation_type;
115public:
116  typedef Dense<operation_type::dim, typename operation_type::result_type>
117  cache_type;
118  typedef typename operation_type::map_type map_type;
119  typedef typename operation_type::result_type value_type;
120  static dimension_type const dim = operation_type::dim;
121
122  Binary(operation_type const &op) : operation_(op) {}
123  Binary(Binary const &b) : operation_(b.operation_), cache_(b.cache_) {}
124
125  length_type size() const VSIP_NOTHROW { return operation_.size();}
126  length_type size(dimension_type block_dim, dimension_type d) const VSIP_NOTHROW
127  { return operation_.size(block_dim, d);}
128  void increment_count() const VSIP_NOTHROW {}
129  void decrement_count() const VSIP_NOTHROW {}
130  map_type const &map() const VSIP_NOTHROW { return operation_.map();}
131
132  operation_type const &operation() const VSIP_NOTHROW { return operation_;}
133  LBlock const &arg1() const VSIP_NOTHROW {return operation_.arg1();}
134  RBlock const &arg2() const VSIP_NOTHROW {return operation_.arg2();}
135
136  value_type get(index_type i) const
137  { 
138    evaluate();
139    return cache_->get(i);
140  }
141  value_type get(index_type i, index_type j) const
142  { 
143    evaluate();
144    return cache_->get(i, j);
145  }
146  value_type get(index_type i, index_type j, index_type k) const
147  { 
148    evaluate();
149    return cache_->get(i, j, k);
150  }
151
152  /// Evaluate the operation to make this type usable as an ordinary block.
153  void evaluate() const
154  {
155    if (!cache_.get())
156    {
157      cache_.reset(new cache_type(impl::block_domain<dim>(operation_)));
158      operation_.apply(*(cache_.get()));
159    }
160  }
161  /// Evaluate the operation into the given result block.
162  template <typename ResultBlock>
163  void apply(ResultBlock &result) const
164  {
165    // If this expression was already evaluated,
166    // just copy the cached result.
167    if (cache_.get()) impl::assign<dim>(result, *cache_);
168    else operation_.apply(result);
169  }
170
171  typename cache_type::const_data_type impl_data() const 
172  {
173    evaluate();
174    return cache_->impl_data();
175  }
176  stride_type impl_stride(dimension_type block_dim, dimension_type d) const
177  {
178    evaluate();
179    return cache_->impl_stride(block_dim, d);
180  }
181
182private:
183  operation_type operation_;
184  mutable impl::Ref_counted_ptr<cache_type> cache_;
185};
186
187} // namespace vsip_csl::expr
188} // namespace vsip_csl

195/// Specialize Is_expr_block for binary expr blocks.
196template <template <typename, typename> class Operation,
197	  typename LBlock,
198	  typename RBlock,
199	  bool Elementwise>
200struct Is_expr_block<expr::Binary<Operation, LBlock, RBlock, Elementwise> >
201{ static bool const value = true; };
202
203/// Specialize View_block_storage to control how views store binary
204/// expression blocks.
205template <template <typename, typename> class Operation,
206	  typename LBlock,
207	  typename RBlock,
208	  bool Elementwise>
209struct View_block_storage<expr::Binary<Operation,
210				 LBlock,
211				 RBlock,
212				 Elementwise> const>
213  : By_value_block_storage<expr::Binary<Operation,
214					LBlock,
215					RBlock,
216					Elementwise> const>
217{
218};
219
220template <template <typename, typename> class Operation,
221	  typename LBlock,
222	  typename RBlock,
223	  bool Elementwise>
224struct View_block_storage<expr::Binary<Operation,
225				       LBlock,
226				       RBlock, Elementwise> >
227{
228  // No typedef provided.  A non-const expresstion template block is
229  // an error.
230};

232/// DDA on a non-elementwise Binary works via its cache.
233template <template <typename, typename> class O,
234	  typename A1, typename A2>
235struct Block_layout<expr::Binary<O, A1, A2> const>
236  : Block_layout<typename expr::Binary<O, A1, A2>::cache_type>
237{
238};

240template <template <typename, typename> class Operation,
241	  typename LBlock,
242	  typename RBlock,
243	  bool Elementwise>
244struct Distributed_local_block<
245  expr::Binary<Operation, LBlock, RBlock, Elementwise> const>
246{
247  typedef expr::Binary<Operation,
248		       typename Distributed_local_block<LBlock>::type,
249		       typename Distributed_local_block<RBlock>::type,
250		       Elementwise> const
251  type;
252  typedef expr::Binary<Operation,
253		       typename Distributed_local_block<LBlock>::proxy_type,
254		       typename Distributed_local_block<RBlock>::proxy_type,
255		       Elementwise> const
256  proxy_type;
257};
258
259template <template <typename, typename> class Operation,
260	  typename LBlock,
261	  typename RBlock,
262	  bool Elementwise>
263struct Distributed_local_block<
264  expr::Binary<Operation, LBlock, RBlock, Elementwise> >
265{
266  typedef expr::Binary<Operation,
267		       typename Distributed_local_block<LBlock>::type,
268		       typename Distributed_local_block<RBlock>::type,
269		       Elementwise>
270  type;
271  typedef expr::Binary<Operation,
272		       typename Distributed_local_block<LBlock>::proxy_type,
273		       typename Distributed_local_block<RBlock>::proxy_type,
274		       Elementwise>
275  proxy_type;
276};
277
278template <template <typename, typename> class Operation,
279	  typename Arg1, typename Arg2>
280expr::Binary<Operation,
281	     typename Distributed_local_block<Arg1>::type,
282	     typename Distributed_local_block<Arg2>::type,
283	     true>
284get_local_block(expr::Binary<Operation, Arg1, Arg2, true> const &block)
285{
286  typedef expr::Binary<Operation,
287    typename Distributed_local_block<Arg1>::type,
288    typename Distributed_local_block<Arg2>::type, true>
289    block_type;
290
291  return block_type(get_local_block(block.arg1()),
292		    get_local_block(block.arg2()));
293}
294
295template <template <typename, typename> class Operation,
296	  typename Arg1, typename Arg2>
297expr::Binary<Operation,
298	     typename Distributed_local_block<Arg1>::type,
299	     typename Distributed_local_block<Arg2>::type,
300	     false>
301get_local_block(expr::Binary<Operation, Arg1, Arg2, false> const &block)
302{
303  typedef expr::Binary<Operation,
304    typename Distributed_local_block<Arg1>::type,
305    typename Distributed_local_block<Arg2>::type, false>
306    block_type;
307  typename Operation<Arg1, Arg2>::local_type 
308    local_operation(block.operation().local());
309  block_type local_block(local_operation);
310  return local_block;
311}
312
313template <typename CombineT,
314	  template <typename, typename> class Operation,
315	  typename LBlock,
316	  typename RBlock,
317	  bool Elementwise>
318struct Combine_return_type<CombineT,
319			   expr::Binary<Operation, LBlock, RBlock, Elementwise> const>
320{
321  typedef expr::Binary<Operation,
322		typename Combine_return_type<CombineT, LBlock>::tree_type,
323		typename Combine_return_type<CombineT, RBlock>::tree_type,
324		Elementwise> const tree_type;
325  typedef tree_type type;
326};
327
328template <typename CombineT,
329	  template <typename, typename> class Operation,
330	  typename LBlock,
331	  typename RBlock,
332	  bool Elementwise>
333struct Combine_return_type<CombineT,
334			   expr::Binary<Operation, LBlock, RBlock, Elementwise> >
335: Combine_return_type<CombineT,
336		      expr::Binary<Operation, LBlock, RBlock, Elementwise> const>
337{};
338
339template <typename CombineT,
340	  template <typename, typename> class Operation,
341	  typename LBlock,
342	  typename RBlock,
343	  bool Elementwise>
344typename Combine_return_type<CombineT,
345			     expr::Binary<Operation, LBlock, RBlock, Elementwise> const>::type
346apply_combine(CombineT const&                                                     combine,
347	      expr::Binary<Operation, LBlock, RBlock, Elementwise> const &block)
348{
349  typedef typename Combine_return_type<
350    CombineT, expr::Binary<Operation, LBlock, RBlock, Elementwise> const>::type
351    block_type;
352
353  return block_type(apply_combine(combine, block.arg1()),
354		    apply_combine(combine, block.arg2()));
355}
356
357template <typename                            VisitorT,
358	  template <typename, typename> class Operation,
359	  typename                            LBlock,
360	  typename                            RBlock,
361	  bool Elementwise>
362void
363apply_leaf(VisitorT const &visitor,
364	   expr::Binary<Operation, LBlock, RBlock, Elementwise> const& block)
365{
366  apply_leaf(visitor, block.arg1());
367  apply_leaf(visitor, block.arg2());
368}

372template <dimension_type D,
373	  typename M,
374	  template <typename, typename> class O,
375	  typename B1,
376	  typename B2>
377struct Is_par_same_map<D, M, expr::Binary<O, B1, B2, true> const>
378{
379  typedef expr::Binary<O, B1, B2, true> const block_type;
380
381  static bool value(M const &map, block_type &block)
382  {
383    return Is_par_same_map<D, M, B1>::value(map, block.arg1()) &&
384           Is_par_same_map<D, M, B2>::value(map, block.arg2());
385  }
386};
387
388template <dimension_type D,
389	  typename M,
390	  template <typename, typename> class O,
391	  typename B1,
392	  typename B2>
393struct Is_par_same_map<D, M, expr::Binary<O, B1, B2, false> const>
394{
395  typedef expr::Binary<O, B1, B2, false> const block_type;
396
397  static bool value(M const &map, block_type &block)
398  {
399    return Is_par_same_map<D, M, O<B1, B2> >::value(map, block.operation());
400  }
401};
402
403template <template <typename, typename> class O,
404	  typename B1,
405	  typename B2>
406struct Is_par_reorg_ok<expr::Binary<O, B1, B2, true> const>
407{
408  static bool const value = Is_par_reorg_ok<B1>::value &&
409                            Is_par_reorg_ok<B2>::value;
410};
411
412template <template <typename, typename> class O,
413	  typename B1,
414	  typename B2>
415struct Is_par_reorg_ok<expr::Binary<O, B1, B2, false> const>
416{
417  static bool const value = false;
418};
